title: Proportion of color and additional feature for car

content.description:
A random sample of <math alttext="1,092" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>1</mn><mtext>,</mtext><mn>092</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> people were asked whether color was a consideration in buying a new car. They were also asked to identify one additional feature that was important. The responses are shown in the table.

Color Consideration

Yes
 No
 Maybe
 Total

Comfort

content.question: Which of the following is closest to the proportion of people who responded no to color consideration and who identified safety as the additional feature that was important?

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Compare distributions or relative positions of points within a distribution.
